name: TreeItem2

slots.name: root
slots.description: The component that renders the root.

slots.name: content
slots.description:
The component that renders the content of the item.
(e.g.: everything related to this item, not to its children).

slots.name: groupTransition
slots.description: The component that renders the children of the item.

slots.name: iconContainer
slots.description: The component that renders the icon.

slots.name: checkbox
slots.description: The component that renders the item checkbox for selection.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The component that renders the item label.

slots.name: labelInput
slots.description: The component that renders the input to edit the label when the item is editable and is currently being edited.

slots.name: dragAndDropOverlay
slots.description:
The component that renders the overlay when an item reordering is ongoing.
Warning: This slot is only useful when using the `RichTreeViewPro` component.

slots.name: collapseIcon
slots.description: The icon used to collapse the item.

slots.name: expandIcon
slots.description: The icon used to expand the item.

slots.name: endIcon
slots.description: The icon displayed next to an end item.

slots.name: icon
slots.description: The icon to display next to the tree item's label.

classes.description: State class applied to the element when disabled.
Styles applied to the content of the items that are editable.
Styles applied to the content element when editing is enabled.
State class applied to the content element when expanded.
State class applied to the content element when focused.
State class applied to the content element when selected.

  • Rich Tree View - Ordering
